30#ifndef _SDL3_imageFilter_h
31#define _SDL3_imageFilter_h
32
33/* Set up for C function definitions, even when using C++ */
34#ifdef __cplusplus
35extern "C" {
36#endif
37
38 /* ---- Function Prototypes */
39
40#ifdef _MSC_VER
41# if defined(DLL_EXPORT) && !defined(LIBSDL3_GFX_DLL_IMPORT)
42# define SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE __declspec(dllexport)
43# else
44# ifdef LIBSDL3_GFX_DLL_IMPORT
45# define SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE __declspec(dllimport)
46# endif
47# endif
48#endif
49#ifndef SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE
50# define SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE extern
51#endif
52
53 /* Comments: */
54 /* 1.) Convolution routines do not have C routines at this time. */
55
56 //
57 // All routines return:
58 // 0 OK
59 // -1 Error (internal error, parameter error)
60 //
61
62 // SDL_imageFilterAdd: D = saturation255(S1 + S2)
63 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterAdd(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Src2, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length);
64
65 // SDL_imageFilterMean: D = S1/2 + S2/2
66 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterMean(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Src2, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length);
67
68 // SDL_imageFilterSub: D = saturation0(S1 - S2)
69 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterSub(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Src2, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length);
70
71 // SDL_imageFilterAbsDiff: D = | S1 - S2 |
72 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterAbsDiff(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Src2, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length);
73
74 // SDL_imageFilterMult: D = saturation(S1 * S2)
75 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterMult(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Src2, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length);
76
77 // SDL_imageFilterMultNor: D = S1 * S2
78 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterMultNor(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Src2, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length);
79
80 // SDL_imageFilterMultDivby2: D = saturation255(S1/2 * S2)
81 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterMultDivby2(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Src2, unsigned char *Dest,
82 unsigned int length);
83
84 // SDL_imageFilterMultDivby4: D = saturation255(S1/2 * S2/2)
85 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterMultDivby4(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Src2, unsigned char *Dest,
86 unsigned int length);
87
88 // SDL_imageFilterBitAnd: D = S1 & S2
89 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterBitAnd(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Src2, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length);
90
91 // SDL_imageFilterBitOr: D = S1 | S2
92 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterBitOr(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Src2, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length);
93
94 // SDL_imageFilterDiv: D = S1 / S2
95 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterDiv(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Src2, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length);
96
97 // SDL_imageFilterBitNegation: D = !S
98 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterBitNegation(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length);
99
100 // SDL_imageFilterAddByte: D = saturation255(S + C)
101 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterAddByte(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length, unsigned char C);
102
103 // SDL_imageFilterAddUint: D = saturation255(S + (uint)C)
104 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterAddUint(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length, unsigned int bpp, unsigned int C);
105
106 // SDL_imageFilterAddByteToHalf: D = saturation255(S/2 + C)
107 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterAddByteToHalf(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length,
108 unsigned char C);
109
110 // SDL_imageFilterSubByte: D = saturation0(S - C)
111 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterSubByte(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length, unsigned char C);
112
113 // SDL_imageFilterSubUint: D = saturation0(S - (uint)C)
114 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterSubUint(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length, unsigned int bpp, unsigned int C);
115
116 // SDL_imageFilterShiftRight: D = saturation0(S >> N)
117 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterShiftRight(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length, unsigned char N);
118
119 // SDL_imageFilterShiftRightUint: D = saturation0((uint)S >> N)
120 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterShiftRightUint(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length, unsigned char N);
121
122 // SDL_imageFilterMultByByte: D = saturation255(S * C)
123 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterMultByByte(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length, unsigned char C);
124
125 // SDL_imageFilterShiftRightAndMultByByte: D = saturation255((S >> N) * C)
126 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterShiftRightAndMultByByte(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length,
127 unsigned char N, unsigned char C);
128
129 // SDL_imageFilterShiftLeftByte: D = (S << N)
130 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterShiftLeftByte(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length,
131 unsigned char N);
132
133 // SDL_imageFilterShiftLeftUint: D = ((uint)S << N)
134 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterShiftLeftUint(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length,
135 unsigned char N);
136
137 // SDL_imageFilterShiftLeft: D = saturation255(S << N)
138 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterShiftLeft(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length, unsigned char N);
139
140 // SDL_imageFilterBinarizeUsingThreshold: D = S >= T ? 255:0
141 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterBinarizeUsingThreshold(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length,
142 unsigned char T);
143
144 // SDL_imageFilterClipToRange: D = (S >= Tmin) & (S <= Tmax) 255:0
145 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterClipToRange(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length,
146 unsigned char Tmin, unsigned char Tmax);
147
148 // SDL_imageFilterNormalizeLinear: D = saturation255((Nmax - Nmin)/(Cmax - Cmin)*(S - Cmin) + Nmin)
149 SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterNormalizeLinear(unsigned char *Src, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length, int Cmin,
150 int Cmax, int Nmin, int Nmax);
151
152 /* Ends C function definitions when using C++ */
153#ifdef __cplusplus
154}
155#endif
156
157#endif /* _SDL3_imageFilter_h */
SDL_imageFilterAddUint
SDL3_IMAGEFILTER_SCOPE int SDL_imageFilterAddUint(unsigned char *Src1, unsigned char *Dest, unsigned int length, unsigned int bpp, unsigned int C)
Filter using AddUint: D = saturation255((S[i] + Cs[i % BPP])
